suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider adding more elements or details to the right side of the image to balance it with the left side. This could include additional objects, characters, or background elements that complement the existing stack of books and schoolbag. Enhancing the background with subtle details or patterns can also help create a more cohesive and engaging composition.
